text:
@MattHancock More lies from @MattHancock 

He announced 133,784 tests but failed to state that only 69,194 people were tested.

64,194 tests yesterday that haven’t been anywhere near a laboratory.

69,194 people were tested yesterday.

          STOP LYING TO US

https://t.co/RLnld28miU
